review: I am Shahzad Ali from Moradabad UP.  My knee was broken from many places inside due to bike accident.  I felt that my lag would always be teddy even after treatment.  Doctor Apoorva Dua sir did my surgery in a very big way.  My lag is absolutely straight. Sir's behavior is very good for the patients, he understands the patient properly and also explains.  The best part is that there is a lot of finishing work in the work.  God bless sir always
